Developer’s Guide¶

Home App¶

Model used for scrapping items and storing in the database.

class apps.home.models.Product(*args, **kwargs)¶

Model for storing the details of the product.

save(*args, **kwargs)¶

Slugifying the name field.

View for the home page.

Home page view, dashboard view, filter in dashboard, displaying the product page profile page and edit page.

class apps.home.views.DashboardFilterView(**kwargs)¶

View for filtering the results in the dashboard.

The results can be filtered according to price, site choice etc.

get(request, *args, **kwargs)¶

Filtering the results based on price, site choice etc.

post(request, *args, **kwargs)¶

Post method for DashboardFilterView.

class apps.home.views.DashboardView(**kwargs)¶

View for the dashboard.

Allows user to search for the product,
and display the result in the front end.

The results are fetched from the database.

post(request, *args, **kwargs)¶

Post method for DashboardView class.

Search form to scrap items.

Class to scrap product from flipkart and amazon webisite.

class apps.home.scrap.Scrap¶

Scraping flipkart and amazon.

Scrpping the product name, price, image source, link of the produt.

amazon(search_item)¶

Scrpaing the product from amazon.com.

Extracting the product name, type, price, url, image, description.

flipkart(search_item)¶

Scrpaing products from flipkart.com.

Extracting the product name, type, price, url, image, description.

flipkart_books(prod)¶

Scrapping for books in flipkart.

flipkart_general(prod, search_item)¶

Scrapping for items other than books.

Checkout App¶

Model for checkout.

class apps.checkout.models.DeliveryDetails(*args, **kwargs)¶

Model for storing the details of the order.

The billing address, user id, product id.

save(*args, **kwargs)¶

Calculating the total payable amount.

Views for checkout app.

This view stores the billing address. Displays the summary of the product ordered, billing address and the total payment amount. This view also makes payment using the Strip payment processing api. And the finally displays that the ordered is placed successfully.

class apps.checkout.views.DeliveryDetailsView(**kwargs)¶

View for taking the delivery details.

Stores the delivery address in the database.

Used for handling upload file.

Views for usermanager app.

Signup, login and acitivation views.

apps.usermanager.views.activate(request)¶

Activating the user.

Updating the is_active field in the auth_user table from False to True.

apps.usermanager.views.app_login(request)¶

View for login.

apps.usermanager.views.generate_activation_key(email)¶

Generating an unique acitivation key.

apps.usermanager.views.send_activation_mail(username, receiver_email, activation_key)¶

Sending an acitvation mail to the registered user.
